org.elasticsearch.cluster.routing.allocation.command

Interface AllocationCommand

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllocateAllocationCommand, CancelAllocationCommand, MoveAllocationCommand

    public interface AllocationCommand
    This interface defines the basic methods of commands for allocation

      static interface  AllocationCommand.Factory<T extends AllocationCommand>
      Factory to create AllocationCommands
